com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller

Class FriendsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.zhaorui.dvdcollector.Controller.FriendsController

  • public class FriendsController
extends java.lang.Object

    The FriendsController is a controller of Friends, which controls friends information.

    See Also:
    ArrayList, Gson, Observer
